column5: Hi everyone, my name is Jeremy, i live in Georgetown, Kentucky, and love to fish, especially in Ontario! I am a Deputy Sheriff and been working in the law enforcement field for almost 4 years.  I also love to hunt...when it comes to hunting I hunt pretty much anything, but I am a avid white-tail hunter.  I'm actually headed to Iron Bridge, Ontario in two days to do some serious fishing.  This will be my third trip to Iron Bridge...I love it there.  Last year I brought along with me two guys i work with and they loved it some much they wanted to come this year.  We mostly fish for smallmouth and pike, but this year we would like to catch a few walleye.  The times that i have been to Iron Bridge we mostly fish Red Rock lake which is part of the Mississagi River.  Its Great fishing, but after a week of fishing it slows down a little. This year we plan to target some different lakes in the area like: Tunnel lake, Bright Lake, Lauzon Lake, and maybe the North Channel. I have already started a topic before I introduced myself and thats my bad, but if anyone has any tips for that area that would be great!  I want your honey holes just some tips or some good lakes in the area! THANKS!

welcome aboard, I'm new around here too. There is some great info on this board. The search has helped me out with many questions a newbie wants to ask.  Hope you will post some pics of your trip when you get back.
Welcome aboard Jeremy The people in here should be able to help you out for sure  Paul
welcome sheriff... pls dont shoot... lolz, welcome
Welcome to the best fishing site on the planet.!  Can wait to see your post from Iron Bridge.

Welcome to our site and good to have you aboard Deputy. Make sure to post lots of pics of your fishing adventures cause we love fish porn around here. Hey I just got to ask...You got a dog named Flash cause that would just make it

Welcome aboard Deputy, sorry i can't help as I'm not at all familiar with the area you're planning to fish, but I hope you and your buddies have a great time and post a report when you get home.  Have a great trip  Marueen
take pics... we love em welcome aboard
Welcome! Heading to Tunnel lake this sat myself. I havent been there in ten years! Anything up the 129 is paradise!   TDunn
Welcome....You'll like it here, a great bunch of people!!!
Good on ya for joinin.  If you're into smallmouth, you'll love Tunnel Lake.  Very deep and clear with some real big smallies in it.
